name: Stacksquatch
description:
Stacksquatch is a VR action-puzzle game about stacking, exploration, and cryptozoology. Stack objects, grow bigger, and explore the floating Crystal Islands!

  • Discover and chill with lovable cryptids
  • Unravel the mysteries and lore of the Crystal Islands
  • Sit down or run around, whatever your space allows
  • Enjoy accessible, intuitive gameplay without violence

Get your hiking shoes on and let's squatch!
